title: Just what you need
description: Root is an admin package for Laravel applications. It offers a simple model management with a robust resource API and a modern and fast UI.

title: Dead simple
description: Root is a quite simple, drop-in admin package. It requires less configuration when installing, it's easier to migrate between versions.

title: For the small and medium
description: Root is scoped to small, medium-sized projects: e-commerce or generic CMS projects.

title: E-commerce with Bazar
description: With Bazar our goal is to provide a simple solution for those who want to build a small to medium-sized e-commerce system.

title: Apline.js
description: We choosed Apline.js for our JS framework because it is modern and easy to use without any compile process.

title: Spruce CSS
description: A low-level, lightweight and modern CSS system, authoring tool built on Sass. Give your project a solid foundation.
